mutants.original_line: cur = 0
mutants.mutated_line: cur = 1
mutants.code:
def min_unfairness_sum(k: int, packets: list[int]) -> int:
    n = len(packets)
    packets.sort()
    ps = [0]
    for i in range(n):
        ps.append(ps[-1] + packets[i])
    cur = 1
    for i in range(k):
        cur += i * packets[i] - ps[i]
    ans = cur
    for i in range(1, n - k + 1):
        cur -= ps[i + k - 1] - ps[i - 1] - k * packets[i - 1]
        cur += k * packets[i + k - 1] - ps[i + k] + ps[i]
        ans = min(ans, cur)
    return ans
